thread.title: Steph Curry turns an embarrassing blocked shot into an impossible fadeaway jumper
thread.title_full: Steph Curry turns an embarrassing blocked shot into an impossible fadeaway jumper

author: Hector Diaz
title: Steph Curry turns an embarrassing blocked shot into an impossible fadeaway jumper
text:
Are you serious? 
Steph, we know your shot can’t be beat. But you just got blocked. Sure, you grabbed a rebound but your back is facing the basket. There’s no way you can get a clean shot off. It’s best to look around for a nearby opponent so you can run a play. 
David West is by the free throw line. That kind of shot, while it isn’t flashy in any sense, could work! Points are points, right? All right, ready. Pass that — oh you’re going for the shot anyway. Aaaand it’s in. 
Sorry I ever doubted you, Steph. Please keep making these threes.
